metadata.title: Grimdark Expy
metadata.author: Limrix
metadata.description:
# Grimdark-Expy Definitely NOT one of those other ones. Adds things inspired by Void War.
## Crew Equipment Add some pizzaz with over 20 items to play with in a new menu tab.
Thanks to Nai for help with equipment icons!
### Requirements: [Crew Equipment Library](https://github.com/neopryne/FTL-Crew-Equipment-Library) 0.4+
